message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you for $130. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns. How about we meet halfway at $125? It's a fantastic deal for a product you'll truly value.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair with my pricing. $120 is my final offer.  Let me know if that works for you.
I appreciate your persistence, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it's a good value for me.
